numeric.name: nof_glem_lines
numeric.doc: Number of Number of entries in the GLEM.

property.name: outlif_logical_to_physical_phase_map
property.doc: Map outlif logical phase to physical phase. The suffix for this property is the logical phase, and the value is the physical phase. Every logical phase and every physical phase must be configured.

define.name: inlif_index_bit_size
define.doc: This is the size of a single index in the inlif table. Divide the entry bit size by this to get its size in indexes.

define.name: inlif_resource_tag_size
define.doc: The size of the inlif resource's n-packs. In JR2, we have entries of size 2 and 3, so the packs' size is 6.

define.name: nof_used_in_lif_profile_bits
define.doc: Number of used in_lif_profile bits out of 8

define.name: nof_in_lif_incoming_orientation
define.doc: Number of possible in_lif profile incoming orientation groups.

define.name: drop_in_lif
define.doc: local in_lif id performing trap with drop action.

numeric.name: nof_dpc_local_in_lifs
numeric.doc: Number of duplicate per core local inlifs in the device. The number represents the number of indexes, not the number of entries. This value is per core, so the overall number is twice that. LIF-2,3 are using this value.

numeric.name: dpc_local_inlif_array_sw_size
numeric.value: DATA(lif, in_lif, nof_dpc_local_in_lifs) * DATA(device, general, max_nof_cores)

numeric.name: dpc_local_inlif_hash_sw_size
numeric.value: DATA(lif, in_lif, dpc_local_inlif_array_sw_size) / DATA(lif, in_lif, inlif_minimum_index_size)

numeric.name: nof_sbc_local_in_lifs
numeric.doc: Number of shared by cores local inlifs in the device. LIF-1 is using this value.

numeric.name: sbc_local_inlif_hash_sw_size
numeric.value: DATA(lif, in_lif, sbc_local_inlif_array_sw_size) / DATA(lif, in_lif, inlif_minimum_index_size)

numeric.name: all_local_inlifs_array_sw_size
numeric.value: DATA(lif, in_lif, sbc_local_inlif_array_sw_size) + DATA(lif, in_lif, dpc_local_inlif_array_sw_size)

numeric.name: all_local_inlif_hash_sw_size
numeric.value: DATA(lif, in_lif, sbc_local_inlif_hash_sw_size) + DATA(lif, in_lif, dpc_local_inlif_hash_sw_size)

property.name: in_lif_profile_egress_allocate
property.doc: number of values needed for egress property in_lif_orientation in in_lif_profile

property.name: in_lif_profile_egress_allocate
property.doc: number of values needed for egress property ive_inner_qos_dp_profile in in_lif_profile

property.name: in_lif_profile_egress_allocate
property.doc: number of values needed for egress property ive_outer_qos_dp_profile in in_lif_profile

property.name: in_lif_profile_egress_allocate
property.doc: number of values needed for egress property same_interface_mode in in_lif_profile

define.name: max_nof_lif_tables
define.doc: Maximal number of logical lif tables (inlif + outlif)

define.name: max_nof_result_types
define.doc: Maximal number of result types in lif table

define.name: max_fields_per_result_type
define.doc: Maximal number of fields for one result types in lif table
